description: Number of items to return. Values are from 1-300. If unspecified, the default value is 25.
**Available Version:** 57.0

description: Name of the dataspace.
**Available Version:** 57.0

description: Definition type of the calculated insight. Values are: - CalculatedMetric - ExternalMetric - StreamingMetric
**Available Version:** 57.0

description: Number of rows to skip before returning results. If unspecified, no rows are skipped.
**Available Version:** 57.0

description: Sort order for the result set, seuch as GenderId__c.ASC, Occupation__c.DESC. If unspecified, items are returned in the order they are retrieved.
**Available Version:** 57.0

description: Specifies the page token to use to view a page of information. Page tokens are returned as part of the response, such as currentPageToken or nextPageToken. If unspecified, the first page is returned.
**Available Version:** 57.0
displayName: Data Cloud Calculated Insights, Create

description: Create a calculated insight.
**Available Version:** 57.0

description: Success
Data Cloud Calculated Insight (*CdpCalculatedInsightRepresentation*)

example: { "displayName": "dev1__demo_draft_ci_6__cio", "apiName": "dev1__demo_draft_ci_6__cio", "definitionType": "CalculatedMetric", "expression": "SELECT count(ssot__Individual__dlm.ssot__DataSourceId__c) as dev1__m1__c, ssot__Individual__dlm.ssot__Id__c as dev1__d1__c FROM ssot__Individual__dlm WHERE ssot__Individual__dlm.ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c= 'test name' GROUP BY dev1__d1__c", "draft": true, "createdFromPackage": false, "dataSpaceName": "", "description": "", "packagedCalculatedInsightApiName": "", "publishScheduleEndDate": "", "publishScheduleInterval": "NotScheduled", "publishScheduleStartDateTime": "" }

displayName: Data Cloud Calculated Insight Query

description: Query a Calculated Insight object.
**Available Version:** 52.0

description: Success
Data Cloud Query Output (*CdpQueryOutputRepresentation*)

description: Number of items to return. Values are from 1-4,999. If unspecified, the default value is 4999.
**Available Version:** 52.0

description: Comma-separated list of up to 10 dimensions, such as GenderId__c, to project. If unspecified, this parameter includes all of the available dimensions.
**Available Version:** 52.0

description: Filter the result set to a more narrow scope or specific type, such as [GenderId__c=Male,FirstName__c=Angel].
**Available Version:** 52.0

description: Comma-separated list of up to 5 measures, such as TotalSales__c, to project. If unspecified, this parameter includes all of the available measures.
**Available Version:** 52.0

description: Number of rows to skip before returning results. If unspecified, no rows are skipped.
**Available Version:** 52.0

description: Sort order for the result set, such as GenderId__c ASC,Occupation__c DESC. If unspecified, items are returned in the order they are retrieved.
**Available Version:** 52.0

description: Time range for the measures. Values are: HOUR, DAY, MONTH, QUARTER, or YEAR.
If unspecified, no time range is applied.
**Available Version:** 54.0
description: Name of the calculated insight object.

description: Get Insight metadata, including Calculated Insight objects, their dimensions and measures.
**Available Version:** 52.0

description: Success

description: Get metadata for a Calculated Insight object. Metadata includes dimensions and measures.

description: Success

description: Name of the calculated insight object.

description: Get all metadata, including Calculated Insights, Engagement, Profile, and other objects, as well as their relationships to other objects.

description: Success
Data Cloud Query Metadata Output (*CdpQueryMetadataOutputRepresentation*)

description: Category of the metadata entity. Valid values are Profile, Engagement, and Related. If unspecified, all category entities are returned.
**Available Version:** 54.0

description: Metadata name of the entity, for example UnifiedIndividual__dlm. If unspecified, a complete list of entities is returned.
**Available Version:** 54.0

description: Type of metadata entity requested. Valid values are DataLakeObject, DataModelObject, and CalculatedInsight. If unspecified, all types are returned.
**Available Version:** 54.0

description: Get metadata for data model objects in the profile category, including Individual, Contact Point Email, Unified Individual, and Contact Point Address objects. Metadata includes the objects, their fields, and category.

description: Success

description: Query a Profile data model object using filters.

description: Success
Data Cloud Query Output (*CdpQueryOutputRepresentation*)

description: Number of items to return. Values are from 1-4,999. If unspecified, the default value is 100.
**Available Version:** 52.0

description: Comma-separated list of up to 10 dimensions, such as GenderId__c, to project. If unspecified, this parameter includes all of the available dimensions.
**Available Version:** 52.0

description: Comma-separated list of up to 50 field names that you want to include in the result, for example, Id__c,FirstName__c, GenderId__c,Occupation__c. If unspecified, Id__c is returned.
**Available Version:** 52.0

description: Comma-separated list of equality expressions within square brackets, for example, [FirstName__c=DON].
**Available Version:** 52.0

description: Comma-separated list of up to 5 measures, such as TotalSales__c, to project. If unspecified, this parameter includes all of the available measures.
**Available Version:** 52.0

description: Number of rows to skip before returning results. If unspecified, no rows are skipped.
**Available Version:** 52.0

description: Sort order for the result set, such as GenderId__c ASC,Occupation__c DESC. If unspecified, items are returned in the order they are retrieved.
**Available Version:** 52.0

description: If a field other than the primary key is used, name of the key field, for example, FirstName__c. Parameter is required for secondary key.
**Available Version:** 52.0

description: Time range for the measures. Values are: HOUR, DAY, MONTH, QUARTER, or YEAR.
If unspecified, no time range is applied.
**Available Version:** 54.0
description: Name of the data model object.

description: Number of items to return. Values are from 1-4,999. If unspecified, the default value is 100.

description: Synchronously query data across data model, lake, unified, and linked objects. This query returns up to 4,999 rows.
**Available Version:** 52.0
>**Note** > >A newer version of the Query API is available. We recommend using Query V2 API to take advantage of GET calls in addition to POST calls, subsequent requests, and larger response sizes.

description: Success
Data Cloud Query Output (*CdpQueryOutputRepresentation*)

description: Number of items to return. Values are from 1-4,999. If unspecified, the default value is 100.
**Available Version:** 53.0

description: Number of rows to skip before returning results. If unspecified, no rows are skipped.
**Available Version:** 53.0

description: Sort order for the result set, such as GenderId__c ASC,Occupation__c DESC. If unspecified, items are returned in the order they are retrieved.
**Available Version:** 53.0

description: Query up to 8 MB of data across data model, lake, unified, and linked objects.
**Available Version:** 54.0
>**Note** > >Use the nextBatchId from the Data Cloud Query Output V2 response body as the nextBatchId parameter in the Data Cloud Query Batch resource to get the next batch of data.

description: Success
Data Cloud Query Output V2 (*CdpQueryOutputV2Representation*)

description: Get the next batch of data across data model, lake, unified, and linked objects.
Initially, use the Data Cloud Query V2 resource to query up to 8 MB of data. Use the nextBatchId from the Data Cloud Query Output V2 response body as the value of *nextBatchId* in this API to get the next batch of data. You can continue using subsequent next batch IDs for up to an hour.
**Available Version:** 54.0

description: Success
Data Cloud Query Output V2 (*CdpQueryOutputV2Representation*)
description: ID from the Data Cloud Query Output V2 response body.
